title: Person Of Interest: Alistair Wesley's Theme Reversed
author: FringeMusic107
comment: This show was so good in the first two seasons when John, Harold, Fusco and Carter were the main characters.
I think this hints at that he was originally planed to play a much larger role than he did.
I'm hoping we'll see Wesley again in the next season! He'll be an excellent recurring villain against Reese.
0:53 It's funny, his choice of airport to catch a flight at the end of an episode involving snipers.

They should have had Wesley as a third party/ally to team Finch and Reese. Would have been great to have Reese and Finch and Fusco cornered by Samaritan's faction, in a firefight and injured, then Wesley and a squad of hiw own men break into a warehouse or building SWAT style via rope diving gunz ablazing
description: Just a quick video to show that Alistair Wesley's theme (2x07 "Critical") is, in fact, John Reese's theme in reverse! Don't know what Reese's theme sounds like? Check out my Person Of Interest soundtrack guide at the link below:
